fields.description:
Nullscan provides uris of the form nullscan://null/ - which are added to the list of FileSystems for which Tez should obtain tokens.

This is while trying to obtain tokens for 
{code}2016-02-23T02:49:41,782 DEBUG [main]: tez.DagUtils (DagUtils.java:addCredentials(164)) - Marking URI as needing credentials: nullscan://null/default.studenttab10k/part_
{code}

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: NullScan fails on a secure setup
